=== Config ===

{{main|Configured feature}}
{{el|java}}:
<section begin="config"/><div class="treeview">
* {{nbt|compound|config}}
**{{nbt|string|surface}} The surface to place on. One of <code>floor</code>, or <code>ceiling</code>
** {{nbt|int}}{{nbt|compound|depth}} Value between 1 and 128 (inclusive).
***{{nbt inherit/int_provider}}
**{{nbt|int|vertical_range}} Value between 1 and 256 (inclusive).
**{{nbt|float|extra_bottom_block_chance}} Value between 0.0 and 1.0 (inclusive).
**{{nbt|float|extra_edge_column_chance}} Value between 0.0 and 1.0 (inclusive).
**{{nbt|float|vegetation_chance}} Value between 0.0 and 1.0 (inclusive). The chance of placing a vegetation feature is evaluated for each block.
**{{nbt|int}}{{nbt|compound|xz_radius}} The radius of the patch.
***{{nbt inherit/int_provider}}
**{{nbt|string|replaceable}} A block tag with <code>#</code> specifying what blocks this feature can replace.
**{{nbt|int}}{{nbt|compound|ground_state}} The block to use for the ground of the patch.
***{{nbt inherit/block_state_provider}}
**{{nbt|string}}{{nbt|compound|vegetation_feature}} The [[placed feature]] to place on top of the patch. Can be a placed feature ID, or a placed feature object.
</div><section end="config"/>

{{Collapse|title=An example|outerstyle=margin: 0.5rem 0|head=1}}
<syntaxhighlight lang="json">
{
  "type": "minecraft:vegetation_patch",
  "config": {
    "depth": 1,
    "extra_bottom_block_chance": 0.0,
    "extra_edge_column_chance": 0.3,
    "ground_state": {
      "type": "minecraft:simple_state_provider",
      "state": {
        "Name": "minecraft:moss_block"
      }
    },
    "replaceable": "#minecraft:moss_replaceable",
    "surface": "floor",
    "vegetation_chance": 0.8,
    "vegetation_feature": {
      "feature": "minecraft:moss_vegetation",
      "placement": []
    },
    "vertical_range": 5,
    "xz_radius": {
      "type": "minecraft:uniform",
      "value": {
        "max_inclusive": 7,
        "min_inclusive": 4
      }
    }
  }
}
</syntaxhighlight>
